author: Sian J
title: Tranquil oasis in the heart of Paris
text: Excellent location about a 5 minute walk from the metro (M4 line direct from the Eurostar), and just off on a side street so that it's wonderfully quiet even with the window wide open! The area is fantastic for shopping and has a great nightlife with bustling side streets of typically French bistros. Hotel has a lovely non chain feel about it and although our room could have done with a lick of paint it just added to the charm. Our room was a good size with a comfortable bed and the staff were very friendly (special mention to the night porter Laurent who was super helpful, funny, and enthusiastic about Paris). Have already recommended it to family & friends and will definitely be returning!
